May-25: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS systemalerts (id serial PRIMARY KEY, timestmp text, event text, username text, title text, severity text, category text, executable text, filepath text, eventid integer, threatid integer, origin text, type text, source text, description text, reference text, sid text)
ALTER TABLE applications ADD event text;
June-25: ALTER TABLE systemevents ADD exe text;
ALTER TABLE systemevents ADD cmdline text;
August-25: ALTER TABLE systemevents RENAME COLUMN timestmp TO timestamp;

ALTER TABLE systemevents RENAME COLUMN pid TO processid;
ALTER TABLE systemevents RENAME COLUMN name TO process;

ALTER TABLE systemevents RENAME COLUMN parent TO parentimage;
ALTER TABLE systemevents RENAME COLUMN exe TO image;
ALTER TABLE systemevents RENAME COLUMN cmdline TO commandline;
ALTER TABLE systemevents RENAME COLUMN destip TO destinationip;
ALTER TABLE systemevents RENAME COLUMN destport TO destinationport;
ALTER TABLE applications RENAME COLUMN timestmp TO timestamp;
ALTER TABLE applications RENAME COLUMN pid TO identifier;
ALTER TABLE applications RENAME COLUMN ec2instanceid TO ec2_instance_id;
ALTER TABLE applications RENAME COLUMN servicename TO description;
ALTER TABLE applications RENAME COLUMN displayname TO name;
ALTER TABLE applications RENAME COLUMN executable TO image;
ALTER TABLE applications RENAME COLUMN start TO state;
ALTER TABLE applications RENAME COLUMN sid TO guid;
ALTER TABLE applications ADD vendor text;
ALTER TABLE applications ADD version text;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS systemlog (id serial PRIMARY KEY, timestamp text, event text, hostname text, source text, platform text, message text, value text)
